snippet: “Push Girls,” an unscripted television series that has it premiere on the Sundance Channel on Monday, follows the normal concerns of friends who are in wheelchairs.
abstract: Sundance Channel's Push Girls unscripted television series follows the normal lives of four female friends who are in wheelchairs; producer Gay Rosenthal is prepared for the criticism of being exploitative, but dismisses the notion.
lead_paragraph: “Push Girls,” an unscripted television series that has it premiere on the Sundance Channel on Monday, follows the normal concerns of friends who are in wheelchairs.

headline.seo: ‘Push Girls’ on Sundance Looks at Disabled Women
headline.main: They’re Pretty, Normal and in Wheelchairs
headline.print_headline: They’re Pretty, Normal and in Wheelchairs
